ARABIC: وَإِذًا لَّءَاتَيْنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In that case We would have given them an immense reward from Us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We would have bestowed on them a great reward of Our own,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: whereupon We would indeed grant them from Us a mighty reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We would have given them a great reward
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And were it so, We would bestow upon them a great reward from Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We would then have bestowed upon them a great reward from Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And then We would certainly have given them from Ourselves a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and then We surely would have given them from Us a mighty wage,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And then We should bestow upon them from Our presence an immense reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We would have given them a great reward of Our own,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And then We would surely have vouchsafed unto them from Our presence a mighty hire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We would surely have given them from Us a great reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We should then have given them from our presence a great reward;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We should then have bestowed upon them a great reward from Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and then We would surely have given them from Our Own, a great wage,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We would have given them from Our presence a rich compensation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And then We would have given them from Us a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:67] And then, that is, had they confirmed themselves, We would have surely given them from Us a great wage, that is, Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And then) if they did what they were commanded to do (We should bestow upon them from Our presence) from Us (an immense reward) an abundant reward in Paradise,
